name: Spark AR Patch Asset
summary: An ARPATCH file is a patch asset created by Spark AR Studio, an augmented reality (AR) effects application that integrates with Facebook and Instagram. It contains a group of patches that a user placed and connected in Spark AR Studio's Patch Editor. ARPATCH files are used to add interactivity, animation, and logic to Spark AR Studio effects.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
